entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: SW 53 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
